A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Objectively\, this movie was good but subjectively this movie\, to me\, was nothing but wasted potential. The main male characters barely have any character development and Finn gets sidelined. Some of the characters are horrifyingly out-of-character. Luke's character gets *destroyed* because the director has a boner for fascist redemption arcs and it was all for nothing in the end anyway. Luke's character got destroyed for That.\n\nThe OT makes me the happiest and so do the ending to each one of those movies. You know that something is wrong when you have angry tears streaming down your face when the credits roll on a Star Wars movie.
